name: Autobahn Raser 3: Die Polizei Schlaegt Zurueck
name_original: Autobahn Raser 3: Die Polizei Schlaegt Zurueck
description:
Autobahn Raser 3: Die Polizei Schlaegt Zurueck is a racing-arcade game developed by Davilex Games. It came out on 01-12-2000. Koch Media published the game.
Autobahn Raser 3: Die Polizei Schlaegt Zurueck is available on PC.
